content.p: We have a range of resources and templates available to staff in our brand resources SharePoint (university login required), including: Log into SharePoint If you're an external associate, please contact us for access. View and download our logos. Browse and download our templates. We compete for the best students and staff across the globe. It is vital to express our collective strengths through a clear, consistent brand identity. The University of Nottingham has an internal design team as well as a number of approved suppliers on a design roster to meet different requirements.
